⚠ RENOVATION CRITICAL DIFFERENCES vs NEW BUILD

1. Existing structure must be assessed before any work
2. Asbestos / hazmat survey required before demolition
3. Structural engineer must verify existing beams for new loads
4. Face brick matching is critical — note 'match exist' on plan
5. Existing porch, stairs, steel guard to remain — protect during work
6. Gas-proof garage ceiling must be maintained throughout
